sections.title: Concept & Ambiance
sections.body: Friends Bar is a vital community hub in Canggu's social ecosystem. Its core concept is to cultivate a "fun social cocktail vibe" as a warm, welcoming, and unpretentious neighborhood gathering spot. Comfy sofas, an outdoor beer garden, and interactive games like pool and darts encourage guests to relax, interact, and connect.

sections.title: Menu & Signature Experience
sections.body: The signature experience is the daily Happy Hour, famous for its "buy 1 get 1 free" deals, making it a premier spot for pre-dinner drinks and high-value socializing. The menu's unique niche is its creative and substantial "vegan tapas," such as Jackfruit Sliders and Cauliflower Wings, perfectly catering to a health and lifestyle-conscious crowd.

sections.title: Conclusion
sections.body: Friends Bar has successfully captured a vital niche in the saturated Canggu market by masterfully pairing a value-driven Happy Hour with a creative vegan-centric tapas menu. It's more than just a bar; it's a true neighborhood hub, ideal for groups of friends seeking a casual, fun, and interactive social evening.
